protein.general_function: Cell cycle control, cell division, chromosome partitioning
protein.specific_function: May be involved in intracellular vesicle traffic and potentially in calcium-dependent exocytosis in neuroendocrine cells

reference.reference_text: Nogami S, Satoh S, Nakano M, Shimizu H, Fukushima H, Maruyama A, Terano A, Shirataki H: Taxilin; a novel syntaxin-binding protein that is involved in Ca2+-dependent exocytosis in neuroendocrine cells. Genes Cells. 2003 Jan;8(1):17-28.
